document.docAuthor: Barbosa, Julianna Freires & Gonçalves, Clayton Corrêa
document.masterDocTitle: Coelidinae (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Tambopata, Madre de Dios Peru: checklist with new records and description of a new species of Walker, 1858

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Coelidinae (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) from Tambopata, Madre de Dios Peru: checklist with new records and description of a new species of Walker, 1858
